author: Paul Kasabian
title: Donovan Mitchell, Royce O'Neale Play Call of Duty with Ninja
description: Utah Jazz guard  Donovan Mitchell , teammate Royce O'Neale and professional gamer and Fortnite streamer  Tyler "Ninja" Blevins played Call of Duty: Modern Warfare together on Wednesday...
content:
Rick Bowmer/Associated Press
Utah Jazz guard Donovan Mitchell, teammate Royce O'Neale and professional gamer and Fortnite streamer Tyler "Ninja" Blevins played Call of Duty: Modern Warfare together on Wednesday.
Mitchell announced the stream earlier in the … [+1794 chars]
